name: Billy Magnussen
biography: Billy Magnussen was born on April 20, 1985. He is an actor, known for Into the Woods (2014), Game Night (2018) and The Big Short (2015).::Anonymous
trivia: His maternal grandparents were Lithuanian immigrants.
Graduated from the North Carolina School of the Arts.
Plays in a band in New York City Reserved for Rondee which he formed with a fellow actor from the soap opera As The World Turns, a bongo player he met on a street corner and a friend from college.
Born in New York City before moving with his family to Cumming, GA.
His mother was his date to the Tony awards.
Appeared in two films that were nominated for the Best Picture Oscar at the 88th Academy Awards: The Big Short (2015) and Bridge of Spies (2015).
Credits Robin Williams as one of the reasons he started acting.
Co-owner of Foxhole Hollywood which is a creative space for up-and-coming actors, musicians and comedians.
filmography: Joseph Pulitzer: Voice of the People
Your Pretty Face Is Going to Hell
Blood Night: The Legend of Mary Hatchet
